channel.title: Visigoths vs. Mall Goths mailing list
channel.description:
The Visigoths vs. Mall Goths Kickstarter isn't until October, but it would bring much joy to my future self if you would all do me the honor of signing up for the mailing list, so that I spend less of the Autumn tracking down the email addresses of everyone I've played RPGs with in my entire life. This isn't going to be like those daily emails asking why you haven't logged into Scruff (cough), I'm just going to send out an email with the Kickstarter link when it's live.
Link here: http://eepurl.com/dFcKEH
